content: The Apollo astronauts brought back samples from the Moon. These are stored at which space center?

The Apollo astronauts brought back lunar samples during their missions to the Moon, and these samples are primarily stored at the NASA Johnson Space Center (JSC) in Houston, Texas. The Lunar Sample Laboratory Facility at JSC is a special building designed to preserve and study these precious materials. However, some samples are also held at other institutions for research purposes, but JSC is the main repository.
